mapper.sql: sid, tsid, page_layout_sid, value, begin_time, end_time, flag, supplySids
mapper.select:
select
from price_rule
flag=0
and begin_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDay},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
and begin_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDay},'%Y-%m-%d %T')

select
from price_rule
flag=1
and end_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDay},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
and end_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDay},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
mapper.insert: insert into price_rule (sid, tsid, page_layout_sid, value, begin_time, end_time, flag, supplySids) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageLayoutSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{value,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplysids,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into price_rule
sid,
tsid,
page_layout_sid,
value,
begin_time,
end_time,
flag,
supplySids,
#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pageLayoutSid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{value,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update price_rule
tsid = #{tsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
page_layout_sid = #{pageLayoutSid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
value = #{value,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplySids = #{supplysids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update price_rule set tsid = #{tsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, page_layout_sid = #{pageLayoutSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, value = #{value,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplySids = #{supplysids,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
